Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Ornamentation elements
Description: Small necklace or bracelet comprised of a carnelian pendant and glass beads of various shapes, colours and sizes. There are tube-shaped, ring-shaped and round beads coloured green, dark brown, yellow, red and golden. They are organised in three rows of tiny dark brown beads divided by groups of larger beads of different colours.
